frontmatter.title: How to Write & Deploy an NFT (Part 1/3 of NFT Tutorial Series)
frontmatter.description: This tutorial is Part 1 of a series on NFTs that will take you step by step on how to write and deploy a Non Fungible Token (ERC-721 token) smart contract using Ethereum and Inter Planetary File System (IPFS).
frontmatter.author: Sumi Mudgil

Step 11: Connect MetaMask & Alchemy to your project {#connect-metamask-and-alchemy}
